chara.textHome:
Welcome.
Yachiyo isn't home right now, she's at work.

My dad is helping us with money,
but I don't think it's enough.
Good morning.

I made a Japanese style breakfast today
because it's Yachiyo's favorite.

We have rolled eggs, dried mackerel,
miso soup, and natto.
*Giggle*
It's very healthy.
Oh, I didn't think it'd be so sunny today.
I should've done the laundry...

Oh, Yachiyo's off today.
Let me try calling her.
A text from Yachiyo...

"Please get some soy sauce."
Okay...

I'm about to head home with Tsuruno
so I'll stop by at the supermarket.
Yachiyo's still awake...
What is she doing?
Oh, those are Mel and Kanae's mugs...
I guess she sometimes dusts them.

It's so peaceful at Mikazuki Villa,
but I do get worried sometimes.
I feel like some day one of us might leave...

I-I'm sorry, I should stop being
such a pessimist.
Yachiyo isn't here, it's just me...
I guess I'll have to fight this Witch by myself.

I won't be able to ever fight alone effectively
if I keep relying on my friends.

I wonder how all those copies in Endless
Mirrors communicate with each other?

They act so differently from us, so I'm
curious about what they talk about.

Hmm... I'm not really good at memorizing
names for my history class.
There must be a better way...

Tsuruno isn't here today,
so maybe I'll ask Yachiyo.

I put all the things I've gotten from
my friends into this treasure box.

Looking at them reminds me of those times,
it's like a small time machine.

Hey, stop! You haven't even dried
your hair yet, Felicia!

Just because Yachiyo isn't here doesn't
mean you don't have to!

Yachiyo told me that she's added a lot of
cat pictures on her phone recently.

Apparently Sana has rubbed off on her,
but she said she'll never own one
because she'd get too attached to it.
Can you give this a taste?

Yachiyo taught me how to cook
fish with white radish.

She told me she learned it
from her grandmother.
*Giggle*
Yachiyo is so cute sometimes.

Just before, she got excited about
getting a bunch of points on
her supermarket member's card.

Yachio started modeling
a long time ago, right?
I found a picture of her from back then.
She looks so cute, but also really mature.

Uh...this picture was taken when I helped
Yachiyo with her modelling.

It was never used in the magazine,
but I still decided to frame it.

Sometimes I wonder what would have
happened to me if I hadn't met
Yachiyo and come to Mikazuki Villa.
I'm really glad I did.
